comments: Sum_{k>=0} A176696(k)/(2^k*k!)= e^Pi - Pi. - _Jaume Oliver Lafont_, Apr 24 2010
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..20000
prog: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 20080); x=(exp(1)^Pi-Pi)/10; for (n=2, 20000, d=floor(x); x=(x-d)*10; write("b018938.txt", n, " ", d)); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, May 14 2009
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: Fixed my PARI program, had -n. - _Harry J. Smith_, May 19 2009
